network

Class SwitchScheduler<Switch extends Node<T>,T extends Message>

  • java.lang.Object
    • network.SwitchScheduler<Switch,T>
  • Type Parameters:
    Switch - The type of Node this scheduler is used for.
    T - The type of message this scheduler is used for.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FIFOScheduler

    public abstract class SwitchScheduler<Switch extends Node<T>,T extends Message>
extends java.lang.Object
    A generic scheduler.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract void scheduleSwitch(int time, Switch node)
      Schedules the supplied node at the supplied time by determining which messages to send out from that node and transmitting them.

        public abstract void scheduleSwitch(int time,
                  Switch node)
        Schedules the supplied node at the supplied time by determining which messages to send out from that node and transmitting them.
        Parameters:
        time - The time at which to schedule.
        node - The node to schedule.
